import { useContext } from 'react' import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend } from 'recharts' import { Context } from '../../../../context' import './chart.scss' const data = [ { name: 'Mon', progress: 20 }, { name: 'Tue', progress: 50 }, { name: 'Wed', progress: 70 }, { name: 'Thu', progress: 30 }, { name: 'Fri', progress: 80 }, { name: 'Sat', progress: 40 }, { name: 'Sun', progress: 90 }, ] const Chart = () => { const { darkMode } = useContext(Context) return (
) } export default Chart
